wikipedia_page.main: Suzanne L. Charlton (born 1962) is a British BBC weather forecaster and daughter of footballer Bobby Charlton.

response: Suzanne Charlton, BBC weather presenter and daughter of Bobby Charlton, was born in Urmston, as was Judy Loe, actress mother of Kate Beckinsale and wife of the late Richard Beckinsale.
He has been married to Suzanne Charlton, the weather forecaster and daughter of Bobby Charlton, since 1988.
* Suzanne Charlton, former BBC weather presenter, daughter of Sir Bobby Charlton
